pages.text: An upgraded form of the $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafter$(), that accepts identical recipes and allows for easy automation.$(br2)$(info) The desired output is right-clicked, and, if valid, will be shown above.$(br2)$(info) The crafter will try drawing items from an inventory below. Crafting itself is performed by right-clicking with a $(l:crafting/knives)knife$().
$(info) This crafter obeys the $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafter's$() grove stones limits.

pages.name: Chest Location
pages.text: The feeder chest must be below the crafter. Torch locations indicate eligible output inventory spots.

$(info) Unlike the $(l:crafting/fey_crafter)fey crafter$(), only a single craft of a recipe will be made upon activation.$(br2)The result will be ejected nearby or placed into an inventory in one of the eligible locations show in the multiblock.$(br2)$(info) As with the fey crafter, it is possible to automate this completely through the use of a dispenser with a $(l:crafting/knives)knife$() inserted into it.
